title: Open & Close
description: This sound library delivers a composite and very versatile collections of sounds of all kinds of things that can be opened and/or closed.
longDescription:
This sound library delivers a composite and very versatile collections of sounds of all kinds of things that can be opened and/or closed.

Obviously there are several doors, hatches and drawers but also lots of other opening and closing sound effects that will come in handy in your everyday sound design work, especially for Cartoon productions and Game Audio. You will also find, Roller Shutters, Boiling Pot Lids, Umbrellas, Water Boilers, Boxes, … most with several variations.

You can use the sounds as they are or use them for intense sound design.


Please check the SOUNDCLOUD PREVIEW and the METADATA PDF to hear and see what‘s inside.


All Sounds were recorded with Sennheiser MKH8050 + Ambient Emesser 208 MS-Rig in a Sound Devices 744T and 788T and also with a Sony PCM-D100.

All sounds were cleaned, edited and filled with BWF-Metadata for instant use in your projects.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 1005

Number of Audio Cues: 1005

Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

List of included tracks: METADATA PDF

Does music\audio loop: Some

How many sound FX: 1005+

How many minutes of audio provided: 62:36 Minutes

Size: 667.4 MB
